entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to periods of snow this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023
